About the project:

This is my latest project and a current work in progress. The project had a simple start—I didn't want to get out of my cozy bed to flip the light switch before sleeping at night. To fix that, I built a motorized light switcher that I can control using a remote control.

Nowadays, the project has evolved somewhat. Using timer wakeups, I added alarm clock functionality to the system, so it can wake me up in the mornings by flipping my light switch. I am currently working on adding a web interface so I can easily control the alarm function.

This project is not done yet, so come back for more details soon!
